Package touchcontrol.touchables

Class Touchable

  • java.lang.Object
    • touchcontrol.touchables.Touchable

  • public abstract class Touchable
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains fundamental functions for a Touchable object of any kind
    Author:
    mattson543
